Clara Augusta Borrmann

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: John T. and Tilda Anderson
  3. Location of Family: Lancaster County, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: 12
  7. Date of Birth: 1904-09-21, Johnstown, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1989-12-17, Plattsmouth, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Clara Augusta Moseman
  11. Spouse Name: Paul Moseman
  12. Notes: Clara was a student in Lincoln, NE, in 1923. In 1930, she and husband Paul lived in Chicago, where Paul worked as an engineer at the Edison Co. By 1940, they had returned to Nebraska, where Paul was assistant manager of a grain elevator.
  13. Source: 1920 United States Federal Census; Lincoln City Directory, 1923 (Lincoln, NE: Lincoln City Directory Company, 1923), 82; 1930 United States Federal Census; 1940 United States Federal Census; Gravestone, O'Neill Cemetery, O'Neill, NE
